types.style: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)
types.refactor: Code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
types.test: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
types.build: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)
types.ci: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)
types.chore: Other changes that don't modify src or test files
